LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOnly.label: medical only
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOnly.description: Poisoning the body for recreational purposes is a deeply immoral act.
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOrSocial.label: medical or social only
LanguageData.DrugUse_MedicalOrSocial.description: A drink with a smoke is fine, especially with friends, but poisoning the body with powerful chemicals is wrong.
LanguageData.DrugUse_Prohibited.label: 금기
LanguageData.DrugUse_Prohibited.description: 육신은 절대로 약물 따위에 더럽혀져서는 안 된다. 유일한 예외는 직접적인 치료에 약품을 사용할 때이다.
